AboutOresteDescription1: I'm Oreste Twizeyimana, a Programmer Developer with 2 years of experience building software solutions that are both elegant and effective. My technical expertise includes C#, .NET, Vue.js, and more â€“ see my ProgrammingModel section for a deeper dive.
AboutOresteDescription2: I'm a dedicated problem-solver who thrives on the challenge of crafting clean, well-structured code. In my spare time, I'm always tinkering with side projects and exploring new technologies.
AboutOresteDescription3: I also enjoy modeling; explore my portfolio on Instagram [Insert Instagram Link Here].
ContactFormDescription: Please use this form to contact with any questions or feedback:
contactMessage: Drop me a line and I'll get back to you ASAP! Whether you have a suggestion, a comment, or just want to say hi, I'd love to hear from you!
CraftingTechnicalSolutionsHeading: Crafting Technical Solutions with Multilingual Flair
FromCodeToCommunicationSubheading: From code to communication, shaping your vision
WelcomeToMyPortfolio: Hey, welcome to my OC Portfolio!
InterestInMyWork: Thank you for taking an interest in my work. This page serves as a comprehensive showcase of my programming styles, skills, and overall profile. I am a passionate developer adept at crafting technical solutions that are not only functional but also linguistically sound.
DownloadCV: Download my CV to learn more about my experience and skills.
ShapingYourVision: From code to communication, shaping your vision. I'm Oreste TWIZEYIMANA, a Programmer Developer with over two years of experience in the field. I am passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly software solutions.
SeekingCollaboration: Whether you're seeking a skilled programmer for collaboration, valuable advice on a project, or simply have an inquiry, feel free to reach out to me. I'm always happy to connect and discuss potential opportunities.
LanguagesDescription: I have a strong foundation in multilingual communication, including native-level proficiency in three languages and fluency in another. Additionally, I bring substantial experience in tutoring English and French.
TutoringExperienceDescription: I have a wide range of experience tutoring students of all ages and abilities. I've helped elementary school students with English, high schoolers with English, French, and Math, and adults seeking to improve their conversational French or prepare for the IELTS exam. My expertise includes Business English for professionals, tailored lessons for young learners, and exam preparation for students facing important assessments. I pride myself on adapting my teaching methods to individual student needs, helping them achieve their unique language and academic goals.
MyServicesDescription: I offer a variety of language learning services, including:
TranslationServices: I am also available for translation and interpretation services.
MyApproachDescription: I believe that language learning should be fun and engaging. I tailor my lessons to the individual needs of each student, and I use a variety of methods to keep my students motivated. I am patient and encouraging, and I am always willing to answer questions.
Testimonial1: Great teacher! Nice atmosphere and professional approach to the student. - Jaroslaw
Testimonial2: Very good cooperation. We are satisfied with the lessons. - Katarzyna
MoreTestimonialsLink: See more testimonials on my Buki.org.pl Profile reviews
ContactMeDescription: Interested in improving your language skills? Let's connect!
ProgrammingJourneyDescription: As a passionate and experienced .NET developer with a strong background in building and deploying robust backend applications. Over the course of more than 2 years in the industry, I have honed my skills in various technologies and methodologies, enabling me to contribute effectively to complex projects and deliver high-quality solutions.

CSharpSkillContent: Proficient in developing scalable applications using C# and .NET framework.

DjangoSkillContent: Skilled in building robust backend applications with Python technologies, including Django and Flask.
BootstrapSkillContent: Experienced in creating responsive web interfaces with Bootstrap.
ASPNETCoreSkillContent: Proficient in building scalable web applications with ASP.NET Core.
RazorPagesSkillContent: Knowledgeable in creating dynamic web pages with Razor Pages.
ReactRouterSkillContent: Experienced in client-side routing with React Router.
FontAwesomeSkillContent: Familiar with using FontAwesome for web icons.
react_i18nextSkillContent: Skilled in implementing internationalization with react-i18next.

AlwaysLearningDescription: I'm always learning and experimenting. If you have a project in mind, or just want to connect let's connect! also feel free to Download my CV to learn more about my experience and skills.
DoIt-TicketingSystemDescription: The stere8/rttrackers repository is a Flask-based web application designed for tracking stock prices and weather conditions. Here's a summary of its key components and functionalities:
StockTracking: Stock Tracking: Utilizes two classes, StockTracker and StockTracker2, to fetch current stock prices from different APIs (Alpha Vantage and possibly IEX Cloud). These classes are defined in stock_trackers.py and stock_trackers2.py.
WeatherTracking: Weather Tracking: The WeatherTracker class in weather_tracker.py fetches current weather data, including humidity, pressure, wind speed, and temperature, using the OpenWeatherMap API.
FlaskApp: Flask App: The main application logic is contained in app.py, which defines routes for different functionalities such as displaying the homepage, tracking selected stocks, selecting stocks, selecting regions for weather tracking, and tracking weather conditions in selected regions.
HTMLTemplates: HTML Templates: The templates directory contains HTML files (index.html, selectstocks.html, stocktracker.html, and others) for rendering the web pages. These templates use Bootstrap and jQuery for styling and functionality.
StockRepresentation: Stock Representation: The Stock class in Stock.py represents a stock with attributes like name, ticker, and last price.
Gitignore: .gitignore: Specifies files and directories that Git should ignore, including build results, user-specific files, and other non-source code files.
Gitattributes: .gitattributes: Configures Git settings for handling line endings, diffing certain file types, and managing merge behaviors for specific file types.
RealTimeUpdates: Real-time Updates: Implement WebSocket or AJAX polling to provide real-time updates of stock prices without needing to refresh the page.
ExpandedAPIIntegration: Expanded API Integration: Integrate more financial data APIs to provide a broader range of stock market data, including international markets.
UserCustomization: User Customization: Allow users to save their stock selections and view them upon returning to the site, possibly through user accounts or local storage.
ExtendedForecast: Extended Forecast: Incorporate a 5-day or 10-day weather forecast feature in addition to the current weather conditions.
GeolocationSupport: Geolocation Support: Automatically detect the user's location to display local weather information without manual region selection.
WeatherAlerts: Weather Alerts: Implement weather alerts or warnings based on severe weather conditions in the selected regions.
ResponsiveDesign: Responsive Design: Ensure the web application is fully responsive and provides an optimal viewing experience across all devices.
InteractiveCharts: Integrate interactive charts for stock price history and weather patterns using libraries like Chart.js or D3.js.
ThemeCustomization: Offer theme customization options for users, such as light mode and dark mode.

programming.title: My Programming Journey
programming.intro: AS a passionate and experienced .NET developer with a strong background in building and deploying robust backend applications. Over the course of more than 2 years in the industry, I have honed my skills in various technologies and methodologies, enabling me to contribute effectively to complex projects and deliver high-quality solutions.
programming.aficionado: As an aficionado of technology, I've continuously sought to expand my skill set beyond my primary focus. I've delved into modern frontend frameworks such as React and Angular, allowing me to create dynamic and responsive web applications. Additionally, my interest in Python has led me to explore powerful frameworks like Django and Flask. This exploration into diverse technologies has enriched my programming abilities and broadened my perspective on solving complex challenges.
programming.expertiseDescription: My expertise spans across a spectrum of technologies and tools:

projects.name: DoIt-Ticketing System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive ticket management system, allowing users to create, view, update, and delete tickets. The system includes user registration and login features.
projects.overview: A comprehensive ticket management system with robust feature implementation.
keyResponsibilities: Implemented ticket and user management features
Built the API with Flask and the frontend with Angular
projects.keyContributions: Increased user engagement and administrative efficiency through robust feature implementation.

projects.name: Multilingual Portfolio Website in React
projects.description: Developed a responsive, multilingual portfolio website to showcase personal projects, technical skills, programming experience, language proficiency, and contact information.
projects.overview: A portfolio website demonstrating competency and versatility in frontend development with React.
keyResponsibilities: Designed and integrated a contact form
projects.keyContributions: Created a responsive, user-friendly interface supporting multiple languages, and effectively managed contact form submissions.

projects.name: StockIT
projects.description: A web application for inventory management, providing a real-time view of stock levels.
projects.overview: An inventory management application designed for real-time visibility of stock levels.
projects.keyContributions: Implemented a user-friendly interface; ensured data integrity and scalability.

projects.name: Real Estate Website in Django
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive real estate platform with user account management, property listings, and a booking system.
projects.overview: A real estate platform with user account management and booking system.
keyResponsibilities: Implemented user features for property viewings and bookings
projects.keyContributions: Improved user engagement and administrative efficiency through robust feature implementation.

projects.Title: Projects
projects.Description: A showcase of my technical expertise and the diverse projects I've worked on.

ProjectList.Title: School Management System (SMS)
ProjectList.Overview: A comprehensive web-based system to manage daily operations of educational institutions, including student enrollment, teacher assignments, and course management.
KeyFeatures: Add/remove students and enroll them in courses.
Add/remove teachers and assign them to courses.
Create/remove courses and manage enrollments.
Role-based access control for Admin, Teacher, Parent, and Student.
Dashboards with attendance tracking and marks management.

ProjectList.Title: StockIT - Inventory Management
ProjectList.Overview: A web application designed to streamline inventory management for small to medium-sized businesses.
KeyFeatures: Create, edit, and delete products with detailed information.
Real-time stock level tracking and category-based organization.
Responsive design with dynamic product details display.
Inventory reports and exports to CSV/Excel formats.

ProjectList.Title: DreamNDine
ProjectList.Overview: An all-in-one platform for managing property listings, dining reservations, and user profiles.
KeyFeatures: Property listing and search functionality.
User registration and authentication.
Dining reservation system with reviews and ratings.
Swagger API documentation and secure JWT authentication.

ProjectList.Title: Souls Scribbles and Sounds (SS&S)
ProjectList.Overview: A blog platform combining written content with musical elements to create an immersive experience.
KeyFeatures: Rich text editing with CKEditor 5.
Integration with Spotify for music features.
Organized blog archive and curated playlists.
Clean, responsive design for immersive reading.

ProjectList.Title: User Authentication System
ProjectList.Overview: A secure and scalable system for user authentication and registration with both frontend and backend components.
KeyFeatures: User registration with email validation.
Secure password hashing and JWT token-based authentication.
Responsive Blazor WebAssembly frontend.
API endpoints for registration and login.
